fields.name: studyId
fields.title: Study unique ID
fields.description: Semicolon-separated list of (internal) study identifiers (cross-referencing to study worksheet) where the event was recorded.

fields.name: envParam
fields.title: Environment parameter
fields.description: Name of the environment parameter constant within the experiment.

fields.name: envParamValue
fields.title: Environment parameter value
fields.description: Value of the environment parameter (defined above) constant within the experiment.
